text:
Régis Lacote (born 25 April 1972) is a French businessman.
Since February 2018, he is the head of the Orly Airport, replacing Marc Houalla.
Graduate from the ESIEE Amiens (1997) and ENAC (Mastère Spécialisé airport management 1997), he starts his career in 1998 as Head of Safety department of the Roland Garros Airport. He joins Paris Aéroport group in 2002. Since February 2018, he is head of the Orly Airport.
